body.raw:
{
    "updateAction": "APPEND",
    "contextElements": [
        {
            "id": "A1 B01P A32-30092016-00-24",
            "type": "Cesion",
            "isPattern": "false",
            "attributes": [
            	{"name": "Aparcamiento", "type": "string", "value": "NW B01P A32"},
            	{"name": "AparcamientoNombre", "type": "string", "value": "DCW04 B01P A32"},
            	{"name": "Cesor", "type": "string", "value": "HA00039"},
            	{"name": "CesorEdificio", "type": "string", "value": "O2"},
            	{"name": "CesorEmail", "type": "string", "value": "pilar.lopezsalmeron@telefonica.com"},
            	{"name": "CesorEstado", "type": "string", "value": "Cesion"},
            	{"name": "CesorID", "type": "string", "value": "HA00039"},
            	{"name": "CesorUID", "type": "string", "value": "HA00039@ANTARES"},
            	{"name": "CodigoError", "type": "string", "value": "0"},
            	{"name": "EstadoPlaza", "type": "string" ,"value": "ENVUELO-CEDIDA"},
            	{"name": "FechaCesion", "type": "ISO8601", "value": "2016-09-30T00:00:00.000Z"},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraAsignacion", "type": "ISO8601", "value": ""},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraConfirmacionAnulacion", "type": "ISO8601", "value": ""},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraConfirmacionAsignacion", "type": "ISO8601", "value": ""},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraLecturaNotificacion","type": "ISO8601", "value": ""},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraLimite","type": "ISO8601", "value": "2016-12-31T00:00:00.000Z"},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraPeticion","type": "ISO8601", "value": "2016-09-29T16:34:38.664Z"},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraPeticionDesestimacion","type": "ISO8601", "value": ""},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraReasignacion","type": "ISO8601", "value": ""},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraRechazoAsignacion","type": "ISO8601", "value": ""},
            	{"name": "FechaHoraSolicitudAnulacion","type": "ISO8601", "value": ""},
            	{"name": "HoraFinCesion","type": "string","value": "24"},
                {"name": "HoraInicialCesion","type": "string","value": "00"},
                {"name": "MensajeError","type": "string","value": "no"},
                {"name": "PersonaBeneficiariaEstado","type": "string","value": ""},
                {"name": "PersonaBeneficiariaPlaza","type": "string","value": ""},
                {"name": "PersonaBeneficiariaPlazaEmail","type": "string","value": ""},
                {"name": "PersonaBeneficiariaPlazaID","type": "string","value": ""},
                {"name": "applicationID","type": "string","value": "GIS_SP"},               
                {"name": "timeInstant","type": "ISO8601","value": "2016-09-29T16:34:38.664Z"}
            ]
        }
    ]
}

The HTTP `POST` request method is meant to transfer data to a server 
(and elicit a response). What data is returned depends on the implementation
of the server.

A `POST` request can pass parameters to the server using "Query String 
Parameters", as well as the Request Body. For example, in the following request,

> POST /hi/there?hand=wave
>
> <request-body>

The parameter "hand" has the value "wave". The request body can be in multiple
formats. These formats are defined by the MIME type of the request. The MIME 
Type can be set using the ``Content-Type`` HTTP header. The most commonly used 
MIME types are:

* `multipart/form-data`
* `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`
* `application/json`

This endpoint echoes the HTTP headers, request parameters, the contents of
the request body and the complete URI requested.
